page.title: 11Derby War Memorial Village
page.content: A village erected as a memorial to the victims of the Second World War consists of{20}two storey houses and{ {27}bungalows adapted for the use of handicapped veterans of the war. The village is located on Chellaston Road between Sinfin Avenue and Merrill Way. The housing is still offered to any ex-serviceman who has received an injury during his service career but also to civilians who have suffered industrial injuries. Residents of the village are suffering from injuries such as paralysis, amputation, and arthritis.
